$name = $_POST['name']; $sql = "update asset set idsistercompany = '".$idsister."', idgroup = '".$group."', idsubgroup = '".$subgroup."', idcategory = '".$category."', idinitialcondition = '".$initialcondition."', idcondition = '".$condition."', noasset = '".$noasset."', name = '".$name."' where id = '".$id."'";
